import React from 'react' import { Avatar, IconButton, InputBase } from '@material-ui/core' import { MdMoreVert, MdAttachFile, MdSearch, MdSend, MdMic } from 'react-icons/md' import { InsertEmoticon} from '@material-ui/icons' function Chat({ messages }) { return (

Room name

Last seen at...

{messages.map((message) => (

{message.name}

{message.timestamp}

{message.message}

))} {/*
{new Date().toUTCString()}

nDs

this is message i want sent to in last week

*/}
onSearchSubmit(e)} // value={searchQuery} // onChange={onChange} // // on click we will show popper // onClick={() => { // setSearchState("clicked"); // setPopper(true); // }} />
) } export default Chat
